resources.string: Device current datetime must be after last synced server datetime which was

SELECT 0 i, (CASE pregnant WHEN \'yes\' THEN \'yes\' ELSE \'no\' END) preg, SUM(CASE WHEN tt1 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt1, SUM(CASE WHEN tt2 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt2, SUM(CASE WHEN tt3 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt3, SUM(CASE WHEN tt4 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt4, SUM(CASE WHEN tt5 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt5 FROM pkwoman GROUP BY preg UNION SELECT 1, \'total\' , SUM(CASE WHEN tt1 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt1, SUM(CASE WHEN tt2 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt2, SUM(CASE WHEN tt3 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt3, SUM(CASE WHEN tt4 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt4, SUM(CASE WHEN tt5 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tt5 FROM pkwoman

SELECT 0 i, \'bcg\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.bcg)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.bcg BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 4 i, \'opv0\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.opv0)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.opv0 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 4 i, \'opv1\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.opv1)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.opv1 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 4 i, \'opv2\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.opv2)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.opv2 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 4 i, \'opv3\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.opv3)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.opv3 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 2 i, \'penta1\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.penta1)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.penta1 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 2 i, \'penta2\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.penta2)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.penta2 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 2 i, \'penta3\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.penta3)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.penta3 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 6 i, \'pcv1\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.pcv1)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.pcv1 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 6 i, \'pcv2\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.pcv2)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.pcv2 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 6 i, \'pcv3\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.pcv3)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.pcv3 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 4 i, \'ipv\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.ipv)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.ipv BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 8 i, \'measles1\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.measles1)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.measles1 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto UNION SELECT 8 i, \'measles2\' vaccine, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'0-11\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'lt1\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'12-23\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'b12\', SUM(CASE WHEN ag.name=\'2+\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) \'gt2\', COUNT(1) total FROM pkchild c JOIN age ag ON julianday(c.measles2)-julianday(c.dob) BETWEEN ag.start AND ag.end WHERE c.measles2 BETWEEN :datefrom AND :dateto
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 0 start, 365 end, \'0-11\' name UNION SELECT 366 start, 730 end, \'12-23\' name UNION SELECT 731 start, 1830 end, \'2+\' name) e
